name: Fruit Frenzy: Match And Smash The Fruit
name_original: Fruit Frenzy: Match And Smash The Fruit
description:
Fruit Frenzy is a very addictive tapping puzzle game! Tap as many of the featured fruits as possible for as long as you can!

Fruit Frenzy Features:
- Colorful and vivid fruits.
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- 3 Game Modes
- 2 Difficulty Settings
